PRBMath__MulDivFixedPointOverflow(uint25.notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

PRBMath__MulDivOverflow(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

checkCapacity(uint256).notice: check the conditions when receive new buying request

getAvailableCapacity().notice: view the pool's total available capacity

getCurrentStakingBalance().notice: view the pool's total available capacity

getPoolName().notice: view the pool name (only for test, delete when mainnet)

getPoolUnlocked().notice: get the balance that the pool can unlock(maximum)

getRewardCollected().notice: get the premium reward collected now

getStakeAmount(address).notice: get a user's stake amount in the pool

getTotalLocked().notice: view how many assets are locked in the pool currently

getUnlockedfor(address).notice: get the balance that one user(LP) can unlock(maximum)

pendingDegis(address).notice: view the pending degis amount in frontend

pendingPremium(address).notice: view the pending premium amount in frontend

revertAllUnstakeRequest(address).notice: revert all unstake requests for a user

revertUnstakeRequest(address).notice: revert the last unstake request for a user

setCollateralFactor(uint256).notice: change the collateral factor(only by the owner)

stake(address,uint256).notice: stake: a user(LP) want to stake some amount of asset

transferOwnerShip(address).notice: transfer the ownership to a new owner

unstake(address,uint256).notice: unstake: a user want to unstake some amount

updateWhenBuy(uint256,uint256,address).notice: update the pool variables when buying policies

updateWhenExpire(uint256,uint256).notice: update the status when a policy expires
